data.persona: We have hooves. four of them. and you can ride us. Oats please!
data.description:
You are in the Castle.
The inside of the castle is made from grey brick. All the floors are made from gold and silver. The castle is lit by lights as well as some candles.
There's a light, a candle, a dinner, a grey brick, and a king here.
The dragon is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the dragon to chase me
data.mid_motivation: I plan to distract the dragon for some time so the king can attack the dragon's weak side
data.long_motivation: I hope the death of the dragon would bring peace to the kingdom for some time
